normalised: Arre yaar, mhaka Myntra thavn ek saree ghetli ani U-P-I payment don pavtim fail zali! Don hazar rupaye echach porim vochun gele. Nimannem mhojem credit card vapravem poddlem. Ashaa asa ki te lok xighra pais porot dit, nam tor customer care-ak phone korcho poddtolo. Konnakui azkal online paymentache issue yetat kai? Oxem dista ki ekek transaction-akui kitem tori prob asa.
